node.title: BitTorrent Web Pro is Available Now! Add Security to your Favorite Web Torrent Client.
node.content:
Similar to the challenges of trying to avoid malware and viruses while browsing the internet in general, it’s not surprising that sites hosting torrent files can sometimes be unsafe.  

Available to Windows users running Google Chrome, BitTorrent Web Pro provides you with more security when downloading torrents using the popular online torrent client. BitTorrent Web Pro not only helps you scan torrent files for threats before you download, but it also offers valuable information about the torrent, including its file size, resolution, and the number of seeds or leeches. This feature allows you to better understand the torrent file’s overall quality and availability in the community.

To learn more or purchase the BitTorrent Web Pro torrent client, please click here.
